name: Hypoxia (fullyrigidgames)
description:
Hypoxia - a 2D Space shooter made for the Godot 2MB challenge.

During your last jump the canopy of your ship was shattered - now you'll need to survive on whatever oxygen and supplies you can find while you slowly run out of air.

Fight to survive and collect oxygen and power-ups on the way. Reach the gateway to jump to the next sector, while the challenge increases with each jump!

Perhaps the next jump, will be the jump home?

CONTROLS -

WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement

TAB - Launch Bomb

P - Launch Probe

Q - MOAB
